items.summary: Update the /apk-download page so that when no ?filename=... query parameter is provided, it defaults to a Version 20 APK filename (use a versioned default like strager-marketplace-v20.apk) instead of the current default strager-marketplace-v1.apk.

Update developer-facing documentation in frontend/public/downloads/README.txt to reflect the current default APK filename used by /apk-download (Version 20), and ensure all example APK links and filenames align with that default.
